title: Yash Raj Films HRMS
description:
Note: This is an internal client project developed under EnPointe.io during my internship, so I can't share the preview or GitHub links publicly. However, I’ve attached screenshots for reference.

YRF-HRMS is a custom Human Resource Management System built for a leading film production company to digitize and simplify their internal HR processes. The platform streamlines tasks such as employee onboarding, leave applications, announcements, form workflows, and access-controlled dashboards across various roles including employees, managers, and HR administrators.

The system replaces inefficient manual operations with an end-to-end digital workflow, supporting real-time status tracking, application histories, approval chains, and detailed insights—helping the organization operate with greater clarity and efficiency.

I was solely responsible for developing the entire backend of this project, which included designing the database schema, building a robust API architecture, implementing business logic, handling complex role-based access flows, and ensuring data consistency and security across the system.

This project reflects my ability to deliver production-grade backend systems that solve real business problems through thoughtful architecture and clean, scalable code.

title: MoneyMate
description:
MoneyMate is a personal finance management platform built to help users track, analyze, and optimize their expenses with ease.

Key highlights:
  • Allows users to log daily expenses, categorize them, and visualize spending patterns through intuitive charts.
  • Real-time dashboard provides insights like total monthly spend, category-wise breakdown, and weekly trends.
  • Secure data handling with MongoDB ensures user information is safely stored and easily retrievable.
  • Interactive UI built with React and Bootstrap ensures a smooth experience across desktop and mobile devices.
  • Chart.js integration transforms raw data into meaningful, easy-to-understand visualizations.
  • Fully responsive and optimized for all screen sizes, making it accessible on-the-go.
  • Planned future updates include AI-driven budgeting suggestions and personalized savings tips.

This project reflects my ability to combine clean design with functional backend integration to build tools that provide real value to end users.

title: BlogIt
description:
BlogIt is a dynamic blogging platform that empowers users to create, edit, and publish blogs with ease.

Key Features:
  • Rich text editor supporting multimedia like images and videos.
  • Real-time preview and autosave to prevent data loss.
  • Customizable themes for enhancing blog aesthetics.
  • Clean, responsive UI for both desktop and mobile.

This project showcases my ability to build content-focused applications with a seamless publishing experience.

title: PawFinder
description:
PawFinder is a compassionate web application built to help reunite lost pets with their owners.

What it does:
  • Lets users report or search for missing pets through a clean interface.
  • Built with PHP and MySQL for secure backend processing.
  • Fully responsive, ensuring usability on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

This platform is more than code — it's a digital initiative built with empathy to assist pet owners in distress.

title: MM Sarkar Taxi Services
description:
MM Sarkar Taxi Services is a business website for a regional travel agency offering safe and reliable taxi services.

Highlights:
  • Clean and informative layout for services and contact info.
  • Mobile-friendly WordPress design with custom styling.
  • Optimized performance for booking-focused experience.

The project reflects my ability to build accessible and professional websites tailored to small businesses.

title: Passport Academy
description:
Passport Academy is an educational institution website designed to promote tutoring services for children and international students.

Highlights:
  • Showcases year-round learning programs and academic support.
  • Responsive WordPress-based site with personalized styling.
  • Supports content about reading, math remediation, and English learning for international students.

This project highlights my skills in building education-focused platforms with clean structure and user-centric design.
